description:
8.109 sofalizer
SOFAlizer uses head-related transfer functions (HRTFs) to create virtual
loudspeakers around the user for binaural listening via headphones (audio
formats up to 9 channels supported).
The HRTFs are stored in SOFA files (see http://www.sofacoustics.org/ for a database).
SOFAlizer is developed at the Acoustics Research Institute (ARI) of the
Austrian Academy of Sciences.

To enable compilation of this filter you need to configure FFmpeg with
--enable-libmysofa.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: sofalizer

options.description: Set the SOFA file used for rendering.
options.name: sofa

options.description: Set gain applied to audio. Value is in dB. Default is 0.
options.name: gain

options.description: Set rotation of virtual loudspeakers in deg. Default is 0.
options.name: rotation

options.description: Set elevation of virtual speakers in deg. Default is 0.
options.name: elevation

options.description: Set distance in meters between loudspeakers and the listener with near-field HRTFs. Default is 1.
options.name: radius

options.description: Set processing type. Can be time or freq. time is processing audio in time domain which is slow. freq is processing audio in frequency domain which is fast. Default is freq.
options.name: type

options.description: Set custom positions of virtual loudspeakers. Syntax for this option is: <CH> <AZIM> <ELEV>[|<CH> <AZIM> <ELEV>|...]. Each virtual loudspeaker is described with short channel name following with azimuth and elevation in degrees. Each virtual loudspeaker description is separated by ’|’. For example to override front left and front right channel positions use: ’speakers=FL 45 15|FR 345 15’. Descriptions with unrecognised channel names are ignored.
options.name: speakers

options.description: Set custom gain for LFE channels. Value is in dB. Default is 0.
options.name: lfegain

options.description: Set custom frame size in number of samples. Default is 1024. Allowed range is from 1024 to 96000. Only used if option ‘type’ is set to freq.
options.name: framesize

options.description: Should all IRs be normalized upon importing SOFA file. By default is enabled.
options.name: normalize

options.description: Should nearest IRs be interpolated with neighbor IRs if exact position does not match. By default is disabled.
options.name: interpolate

options.description: Minphase all IRs upon loading of SOFA file. By default is disabled.
options.name: minphase

options.description: Set neighbor search angle step. Only used if option interpolate is enabled.
options.name: anglestep

options.description: Set neighbor search radius step. Only used if option interpolate is enabled.
options.name: radstep
